text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Rubén Ramírez Hidalgo and Pere Riba won the title after defeating André Ghem and Fabrício Neis 6–7(3–7), 6–4, [10–7] in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Curitiba Challenger - Doubles
title: 2016 Curitiba Challenger – Doubles
